      • NdnNetwork

        public NdnNetwork(URI nfdHostname,
                  net.named_data.jndn.Name globalPrefix,
                  net.named_data.jndn.Name identityPrefix,
                  net.named_data.jndn.Face face,
                  ScheduledExecutorService pool)
        Parameters:
        nfdHostname - e.g. "tcp4://nfd.server.org
        globalPrefix - the broadcast prefix all nodes subscribe to
        identityPrefix - the identity prefix of this node
        face - the face on which this node communicates
        pool - the thread pool
